text: Pamarru is a village in Krishna district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in Pamarru Mandal in Gudivada revenue division.. == Transport == APSRTC operates buses from Pamarru bus station. National Highway 16 connects with Pamarru. == See also == Gaffar center is the oldest traditional market in Pamarru. All the shops are nearly 100 years old and cover a large variety of items. There are great and historian temples in Pamarru such as Shiridi Sai Baba Temple Shivalayam, a very famous and great worshipped temple in surroundings *Sri Ankammathalli Devalayam *Sri Anjaneyaswamy Temple *Sri Venkateswaraswamy Temple *Sri Vasavi Kanyaka Parameswari Temple *Vishnalayam *Ganganamma Temple *Parvathavardhini Sametha Ramalingeswara Temple *Valmikeswari temple (next to water tank) etc., are very famous and most worshipped places. ==See also== *Villages in Pamarru mandal ==References== Category:Villages in Krishna district Category:Mandal headquarters in Krishna district
title: Pamarru, Krishna district
